snippet.title: ナイトメアの世界 Tortured Souls (Reveal Trailer)
snippet.description:
ナイトメアの世界 Tortured Souls is a first-person horror game in an Anime style. The game follows Satsuki, a twenty-two year old Voice Actress who's coming to visit her friends at their workplace. However, it seems that not a single soul is here... or is it?

Discover what happened, find your friends and end the suffering of these Tortured Souls...

Download the game here on https://ashysir.itch.io/
                                                   https://gamejolt.com/@aShySir

Join the Game's discord: https://discord.gg/6waV2mm

Support ナイトメアの世界 on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/aShySir
